price: بىزنىڭ شەيتانلارنى كاپىرلارغا ئەۋەتكەنلىكىمىزنى بىلمەمسەن؟ شەيتانلار ئۇلارنى (گۇناھلارغا) قىزىقتۇرىدۇ[83].
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمۡ أَزّٗا

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara annā arsalnā al-shayāṭīna ʿalā al-kāfirīna ta-uzzuhum azzan
